text: Patricia Elliott (July 21, 1938 - December 20, 2015) was an American actress. She was born in Gunnison, Colorado. She was known for her roles as Ren√©e Divine Buchanan in the soap opera One Life to Live and as Countess Charlotte Malcolm in the Stephen Sondheim musical A Little Night Music. She won a Tony Award for Best Performance by a Featured Actress in a Musical in 1973. Elliott died in New York City, from cancer, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Colorado Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Patricia Elliott
